short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Syncs your FIFA 17 FUT Club with FUTWIZ

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sync your Ultimate Team club with FUTWIZ.

Once synced, you can search your club and see stats for individual players you own, as well as see who you need to buy to finish the collection of players available!
